name: RNGWorld
description:
Early prototype of an random worlds generator,  heavly inspired by https://github.com/fangzhangmnm/moonsoon

Use 'wasd' to move the camera around.

Use the mouse wheel to zoom.

Press 'r' to random generate a new world (it takes some seconds).

Press 'g' to generate a world with the seed in the input field.

In the near future I will add new slider to experiment
